children.text: On first glance, the painting “Las Meninas” (“The Maids of Honor”) might not seem terribly special, but it’s actually one of the most analyzed pieces in the history of art. Why is this painting by Diego Velazquez so captivating? James Earle and Christina Bozsik share the context and complexity behind this work of art.
Lesson by James Earle and Christina Bozsik, animation by Zedem Media.

citation: TED-Ed (Director). (2016, March 10). Why is this painting so captivating? - James Earle and Christina Bozsik [Video recording]. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=loMy3sbW64g
label: Las Meninas
